Name: Charge Tag
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken.  Swap a Combus-Sweat and a Combus-Claw for a Charge Tag at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
